name: Time Trial (HarrisGameDevelopment)
description:
Bio-

Time Trial is a short action packed game made by 2 people for Geta Game Jam 7. You have been given the ability to slow down time, use this to avoid obstacles and gain more air with your jumps. In order to keep these powers you must complete the King of Time's trial, but watch out... things aren't as they seem.

Controls-

W/A/S/D - Move character

Space - Jump

Tab - Pause

Left click - slows down time

Right click - returns time to normal

Music-

Groovy Tower by Waterflame

Extreme action and Enigmatic by Bensound
